display.title: Biome Classifications
display.description: Different Seasonal Effects will occur in select groups of Biomes. These include; Fair Weathered, Warm, Cold, Calming, Hideaway, Cavernous, Deep Below, Harsh Nether, Reprieved Nether & Ender. While a Seasonal Effect may occur in multiple Biome Groups the degree of the effects may be different at different times
